articles.title: Squid Game star Lee Jung-jae debuts as director in Cannes - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: His film Hunt is set in South Korea in the 80s and is loosely inspired by an assassination attempt on military dictator Chun Doo-hwan by North Korea.
articles.content:
But if Lees ascension to being an increasingly world-renowned actor typifies the pop-culture power of todays Korea, his film is set in an earlier, less harmonious chapter in Korean history.

articles.title: Sold for $1.4m: Sellers of Singapore's most expensive HDB flat may be walking away with a cool $650k profit - AsiaOne
